title: Lenovo Ideapad Slim3 Core i3 11th Gen - (8 GB/256 GB SSD/Windows 10 Home) 14 ITL 6 Thin and Light Laptop  (14 Inch, Arctic Grey, 1.41 KG, With MS Office)

product_specification.Sales Package: Laptop, Power Adaptor, User Guide, Warranty Documents
product_specification.Clock Speed: 3.0 GHz with Turbo Boost upto 4.1 GHz
product_specification.USB Port: 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 1 x USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 (Support Data Transfer Only), 1 x USB 2.0
product_specification.Screen Type: Full HD LED Backlit, IPS Anti-Glare Display (300 nits Brightness, 45% NTSC Color Gamut)
product_specification.Sound Chip: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek ALC3287 codec
product_specification.Sound Properties: 2 x 1.5W Stereo Speakers with Dolby Audio
product_specification.Additional Features: Integrated 45 Wh Battery, ErP Lot 3, RoHS Compliant

product_description.Lightweight Design: Light in weight and built with a sleek 19.9 mm body, the 1.41 kg Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 Laptop lets you work or play even when you’re travelling. And, featuring a 35.56 cm (14) FHD display with four-sided sleek bezels, this laptop offers a wide view and immersive visuals.
product_description.High-speed Performance: Equipped with up to an 11th Generation Intel Core i3 processor, this laptop offers fast performance, ensuring increased productivity and efficiency. In addition, its Intel UHD Graphics can easily render heavy games, ensuring a smooth gaming experience.
product_description.Efficient Battery: Integrated with Lenovo’s Rapid Charge Technology, this laptop allows you to perform tasks or play games without having to stay connected to the charging cable. And, this technology ensures such rapid charging that the battery goes from zero to 80% within merely half an hour. Moreover, its three-cell 45 Wh battery ensures long hours of battery life on a single full charge.
product_description.Your Work and Study Buddy: Whether you want to attend virtual meetings or online classes, this laptop is a good choice. It features a 720p HD camera, privacy shutter, and Dolby Audio, ensuring high-quality visuals and sound.
product_description.Easy Connectivity: Equipped with a plethora of ports, this laptop effortlessly connects to other devices. It sports a USB-C port, a USB 3.2 Gen 1 port, an HDMI port, a USB 2 port, a Card Reader Slot, a 3.5 mm headphone/microphone jack, eliminating the need to use different types of adaptors to connect peripherals.
product_description.Additional Smart Features: Featuring AI-driven software, this laptop adds to the convenience of everyday use. Its Lenovo Aware feature sends Smart Alerts, such as Attention, Posture, and Breaks to ensure that you're paying attention, sitting in the correct position, and taking regular breaks while working or learning from home. Furthermore, with Lenovo Eye Care and Noise Cancelling functions, this laptop protects your eyes from strain and minimises ambient noise for a fun experience.

pros.Build Quality: The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 Laptop is lightweight and has a sturdy design.
pros.Fingerprint Sensor: The fingerprint sensor is lightning quick and works seamlessly.
pros.720p HD Webcam with Privacy Shutter: The camera quality is decent and it comes with a privacy shutter.
pros.Performance: The 11th Generation Intel Core i3 processor is more than enough for daily activities like online classes and meetings.

cons.45 Wh Battery: Battery life is extremely poor and lasts only 2-3 hours on normal usage.
cons.Storage: Low storage as it contains only 256GB SSD.

summary.verdict: Good laptop for students for normal daily usage in such a price range.
summary.Additional Information: No graphic card, Contains C-type USB, Expandable RAM.
